item.title: How to make a npc talk\trade 669/703 Help!
item.dc:creator: @EclipseRSPS EclipseRSPS
item.description:
@EclipseRSPS wrote:

Lolâ€¦

To make an Npc open a shop (NPC must have a trade option) go to NPCHandler class and scroll down till you see something like this

else if (npc.getId() == 546) ShopsHandler.openShop(player, 10);

And for a dialouge you would need to do something like this

NPCHandler class

else if (npc.getId() == 3374) player.getDialogueManager().startDialogue("Max", npc.getId());

DialougeHandler class

Class<Dialogue> value43 = (Class<Dialogue>) Class .forName(Max.class.getCanonicalName()); handledDialogues.put("Max", value43);

Read full topic
